title: Zanab247
author: Zanab247
content: Hello guys, I know there are many newbies who are still afraid based on what they heard about the community that caused them fear, which I will like to encourage them not to listen to what they hear than to follow some cryptocurrency rules and regulations to get to were potential members are in the community. First of all, what is fear?  Fear is an unpleasant emotion or thought that you have when you are frightened or worried by something dangerous, painful or bad that is happening or might happen. Here are three types of fear you need to know:1) Fear of failure: fear of failur is among some of the things that made some people give up easily in the community, because they lack personal research to know if what they heard is true or not before carry out their operation. Fear of failur can be articulated in being afraid of never having what it is that we want, or attaining what we want and not being satisfied, not knowing how to accept what we have asked for, and move into that place.2) Fear of now: Now that we are experiencing bear season in the community, it will be favourable to remove the spirit of fear, and take a good bold to invest the little money you have in cryptocurrency, and wait to see what you will become in five years time in the community. you don't allow yourself to take the next step because on the subconscious level you believe you are not enough. You can make it like the way other people are making it in the community, if only you can follow the due process and be bold in your steps in the community.3) Fear of pain: There are some people waiting for the price of cryptocurrency to decrease to $15k before they can buy and hold for future purpose, because they heard that the people that bought at $16k or $20k last year 2021 made it, that the same thing will happen to the price to decrease to the same amount before they can buy that will cause them pain, because cryptocurrency market is unpredictable.  My advice to newbies is to do everything possible within their power to remove the spirit of fear and wear the spirit of boldness in this bear season so that they will be part of those that will celebrate when the price increase higher in the market. What is your opinion?

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: You may also have to know a certain fear called FOMO. This is especially used in cryptocurrency or business environment/investment. It is abbreviated as FOMO but the full words are Fear Of Missing Out and like I said it is used in business environment. As it implies it could be in a way that an investor want to quickly grab some profit and doesn't want to stay out side for the deed to be done, so he could decide to jump in right in. Jumping in may be at the right time for him or at the wrong time, the result justifies his fear. You can get other ways to explain FOMO.

comments.body: Yeah, I guess it's simply fear for newbies, but don't forget that everyone started from 0 and from scratch and we know that feeling.It's just how we really overcome this supposedly fear and then move forward in crypto. What is your opinion?In this paragraph you just explained "buy low and sell high" and everyone wants to do that, right?I disagree with your statement that "the cryptocurrency market is unpredictable". In my experience, all markets are predictable whether on exchanges, crypto, and others. of course with certain elements such as news sentiment, technical analysis, economic developments, and many more. Moreover, many experts reorder and analyze what will happen in the next one to two years or the next one to four years, isn't that their prediction with all their knowledge and experience?I suggest, don't start if you only rely on "possibility" without reset and knowledge, how will you become a strong holder or trader in this world if you only rely on possibilities without a knowledge base?

comments.author: RolonNigel
comments.body: Only first-time entrants into the investment industry are afraid when faced with failure, and those who are really in cryptocurrency are used to the coin zeroing thing. They can regulate their emotions very well, but if they lose a lot of money or all of their money, their emotions will be out of control, and they will inevitably do something.Therefore, it is recommended to invest rationally and not to invest all your funds.
